body.p: As a consequence of these amendments made to IAS 19, and of the option introduced in IFRS 9 Financial Instruments, some material amounts may never be presented in profit or loss. IFRS 9 introduced an option to present some gains and losses on equity instruments not held for trading in other comprehensive income, without subsequent reclassification to profit or loss. In Mr Engström’s view, these recent ad hoc decisions push financial reporting de facto towards a single income statement as some matters truly related to a company’s activities are never to be presented in profit or loss.
